roleset.name: arrange in advance
roleset.note: PREARRANGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'prearrange' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from prearrange.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: usually adjectival
example.text: The Chicago Mercantile Exchange fined and suspended two commodities traders accused of making prearranged trades with each other that allegedly cheated a customer.

example.name: same example, verbal
example.text: The Chicago Mercantile Exchange fined and suspended [two commodities traders]-1 accused of *trace*-1 prearranging trades with each other that allegedly cheated a customer.
